General.Name: Tianjin Silvery Dragon
General.Description: SILVERY DRAGON PRESTRESSED MATERIALS CO., LTD. TIANJIN manufactures and sells prestressed steel products in China. The company offers steel wire; steel rod; steel strand for prestressed concrete; unbonded steel strand; epoxy resin coated steel strand; prestressed galvanized steel wire for bridge cables; galvanized steel strand; high-strength steel strands for shells; high-strength weather-resistant steel strands for ultra-low temperature LNG and LPG; prestressed flexible large-span suspension cables for photovoltaic support; galvanized steel strands and system accessories; unbonded prestressed steel strands for wind power towers; PCCP pipes prestressed steel wire; spiral rib steel wire for railway sleepers; medium-strength steel wire for high-speed rail track slabs and fixed-length rolling steel wires; large-diameter hollow bolts for mines, etc. It also provides automation equipment and precision molds; and new energy products. The company's products are used in new energy, railways, water transmission and distribution projects, highways, bridges, civil buildings, industrial buildings, power transmission and distribution projects, and stress special structural engineering fields. It also exports its products to approximately 80 countries and regions. SILVERY DRAGON PRESTRESSED MATERIALS CO., LTD. TIANJIN was founded in 1998 and is based in Tianjin, China.
